commentBody:
Thank you for your columns all season.

I noticed you mentioned that this is your final column at NYT.

I sincerely hope you write next season. Football season will be 10.24% less interesting without your writing.

I missed your book recommendations and urging your readers to eat less, think more, take long walks, pray, etc.

Thanks for the years of columns and I really hope you are writing somewhere next season.

replies.commentBody: Thanks, Darshan, for writing what I was thinking. Such an abrupt end! Please come back this fall, TMQ, and then follow Super Bowl LI with your annual sermon.
